Select Nums,DocSN,ClientName,CreateManName,DepName,CreateTime,TotalGuan,TotalDai,UsedGuan, UsedDai,FreeGuan,FreeDai from View_CasesMainBrowse Where State>=4 And isnull(TotalGuan,0)+isnull(TotalDai,0)>0
And DateDIFF(${timeField},CreateTime,getDate())=${timeValue}
And
(${item.field} ${item.oper} #{item.value})
order by ${sortField} ${sortOrder} offset #{Begin} rows fetch next ${End} rows ONLY

Select TotalGuan,TotalDai,UsedGuan,UsedDai,FreeGuan,FreeDai,YearMonth as ItemName from (Select Sum(TotalGuan) as TotalGuan,Sum(TotalDai) as TotalDai,Sum(UsedGuan) as UsedGuan,Sum(UsedDai) as UsedDai,Sum(FreeGuan) as FreeGuan,Sum(FreeDai) as FreeDai,dbo.getMonthWeek(CreateTime) YearMonth from View_CasesMainBrowse Where State>=4 And isnull(TotalGuan,0)+isnull(TotalDai,0)>0
And DateDIFF(${timeField},CreateTime,getDate())=${timeValue}
And
(${item.field} ${item.oper} #{item.value})
Group by dbo.getMonthWeek(CreateTime))t Order by ${sortField} ${sortOrder} offset #{Begin} rows fetch next ${End} rows ONLY

Select TotalGuan,TotalDai,UsedGuan,UsedDai,FreeGuan,FreeDai,convert(varchar,Year)+'年第'+convert(varchar,Month)+'月' as ItemName from (Select Sum(TotalGuan) as TotalGuan,Sum(TotalDai) as TotalDai,Sum(UsedGuan) as UsedGuan,Sum(UsedDai) as UsedDai,Sum(FreeGuan) as FreeGuan,Sum(FreeDai) as FreeDai,DATEPART(month,CreateTime) as Month,Year(CreateTime) as Year from View_CasesMainBrowse Where State>=4 And isnull(TotalGuan,0)+isnull(TotalDai,0)>0
And DateDIFF(${timeField},CreateTime,getDate())=${timeValue}
And
(${item.field} ${item.oper} #{item.value})
Group by DATEPART(month,CreateTime),Year(CreateTime))t Order by Year,Month offset #{Begin} rows fetch next ${End} rows ONLY
